text: “Maa tei goodou gaa lahi hagammuni dono duaahina tangada Israel, gaa hai a mee di hege be e hui gi tuai dangada e hai di hege ni mee, tangada dela guu hai di mee deenei la gi daaligidia gii made. Malaa, deenei di godou hai ga tanga iei goodou gi daha mo di hagadilinga hai huaidu beenei.24.7 Exodus 21.16
